website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a matte primer that includes SPF, this product is likely to impress. It's also made by one of the most trusted names in drugstore makeup.
pros: Distances itself from other products on our shortlist because it acts as both a primer and sunscreen with SPF 20
Mattifying formula keeps skin's natural oils at bay
Feels very lightweight under makeup or when worn alone
cons: Oil control may not last all day for all users
Doesn't minimize pores as well as some other primers we considered

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: This actually controls my oily T zone during this 100+ degree weather out here in the desert! I use it on a daily basis. I love it! I have tried a few other primers and so far this is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnastickynote

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the shinning
customer_reviews.text: It helps a lot when you have oily skin. I've tried better primers but this one is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Popsycol

customer_reviews.title: matte is great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this is the best primer I have found to combat oil. I still have oiliness but not as much.
customer_reviews.author: Griffville

customer_reviews.title: So close to being perfect ):
customer_reviews.text: Was wonderful for keeping my oily skin type matte for much longer than my other foundations, but at the end of the day after removing my makeup there would be a new painful kind of bump that I have never had prior to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Solapink

customer_reviews.title: 👍🤍👍
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this foundation! I have combination skin, both oily and dehydrated skin and this foundation felt very light and comfortable. It didn’t cling to my dry spots at all. It’s not full coverage but I prefer that, it was perfect. Also the package arrived on time and very well protected.👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Became interested in this foundation after trying out tue concealer that goes with this line. Got Light Golden. I love it. I have combo/oily skin & this appllies perfectly. Not too dry & not too moisturizing where it doesn't set. Already ordered Medium Golden since it'll be summer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my perfect match they need to change it to the burlee one because I was that tone and this is the exact same color I had cool 1 but its more amber glow but I'm happy now that I figured out which one is for me definitely cool 2 because of the redish golden undertone and I get good coverage
customer_reviews.author: Passion H

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: I have “normal” skin, not oily, not dry so why on Earth my face is oily looking only a couple hours after using this (& with Mattr foundation as well!) I have no clue! I guess I’m better off going without a primer altogether.... disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this primer. I use it with loose powder and my skin looks flawless. My face stays matte and smooth all day. I love that it is a cruelty free brand and I hope they dont discontinue this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ceres

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird.
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is decent, it smells very strong of chemicals. Its kind of awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gaouette

customer_reviews.title: Fair, not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have no real problems with this primer, except that it both looked like and felt thick like glue when applying. After drying it did not feel heavy, and did not cause any breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy and his Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup works very well. Been using it for sometime. CVS price kept going up. So I turned to Amazon. As I thought great price. But I get most of my makeup from Amazon now.👍👍👍👍👍.
customer_reviews.author: Betty.B

customer_reviews.title: Natural look and matches perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Covers blemishes and sun spots on face and it’s not heavy or caked on. Lightweight and looks good. Many compliments
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: mattifying for sure
customer_reviews.text: I use my other moisturizer sparingly and then I use this one on top to take the shine away before applying my make up. By itself, it is not the greatest moisturizer-but it is not marketed as such either.
customer_reviews.author: T.T. of Dallas,TX

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin, psoriasis, this products works; hasn't caused any flares or reactions.
customer_reviews.text: It works real well as a primer and sun block. Drys quick, blends well, goes on easily. Can immediately apply any kind of makeup after the primer with sun block dries. I have also worn the pri.er with sunblock on its own. I will purchase more and I highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but I have very oily skin and I still have to use oil pads to soak up the oil on my tzone
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Just an ok primer
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy the cover girl primer again. I felt like it added no dewiness to my skin at all ... it also did not feel like a good base .
customer_reviews.author: Camgal

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with my purchase overall
customer_reviews.text: This is good makeup. It really does look like skin when you put it on. I have to put a few coats, but overall satisfied with purchase. I need a darker shade though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin more white than anything. It’s dry. And it smells awful. Like straight chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Love powder. Good for highlight and countour, but it doesn't seems to last at all.
customer_reviews.text: Love powder. Good for highlight and countour, but it doesn't seems to last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene LA

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many primers, this one is not my favorite. It does not have a great smell, smells like chemicals. It is also very runny and thin. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Alright Primer
customer_reviews.text: Looks, feels, and smells like Elmer's glue.. BUT my makeup goes on smooth enough and stays on throughout the day, so I can't complain too much. All in all I like it enough to continue to use, but not sure if I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was good the first few times but I have oily skin and struggle with acne so it's always a struggle to find a good product thats consistently working for me. It became a bit too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ichel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just all around great product. Exactly what I was looking for. (Primer +Moisturizing +spf and matte finish)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great For Oily Skin !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I have very oily skin so whenever I use foundation my skin is always shiny & oily but when I use this matte primer it keeps the shine & oil away. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Aveana W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good foundation
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with this foundation. It might give you some breakouts nothing major. I like this d
customer_reviews.author: Sophia hassan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and a lot of primers just don’t do it for me. This helps hold my makeup in place (even in swampy, high-humidity FL) all day. Affordable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Saraswati

customer_reviews.title: Does not last the whole day
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a primer with SPF that had great reviews, but this one doesn't work for me. I have fairly oily skin, and I'm shiny by lunch time using this. The search continues...
customer_reviews.author: ndildine

customer_reviews.title: Matte all day great price!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my makeup on and matte for the entire workday. Very little touch up with powder needed! Great value
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beats ANY expensive primer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best primer ever! I have very oily skin and this keeps me matte all day. I apply a thin layer under my foundation and I stay matte for about 7-8 hrs. Love it! I've tried expensive primers and his is by far, the best!
customer_reviews.author: K & T

customer_reviews.title: Great product for women of color, unlike many others!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth finish. Your face doesn’t look greasy! It’s long lasting, also!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S. Roulac

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product broke out my entire face! I’m 39 and have not had a problem with acne for a long time. After using this product for one week my whole face is broken out! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This product is very light weight!.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because, it is great for concealing large pores!.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Horne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not control oil AT ALL! My face is fairly oily and after only a couple hours of wear my face was already shiny.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it keeps me from glowing. Leaves a nice matte finish. A drop goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: Very blendable and easy to apply..good everyday foundation matches my NC45 skin
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K.

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: It was very thick, hard to blend into the skin. Did nothing for oiliness.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Contouring!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect shade contour and now I’ve found it! Love this powder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cost is reasonably affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I finally found my effortless match!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Left little white flecks all over skin.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Matte Ambition primer and I thought I'd try out the foundation. Their shade-finder pointed me to Light Cool. The shade was more of a Neutral on me, slightly too dark/peach and difficult to blend. To be fair (ha) I'm pretty pale - I normally wear BareMinerals Hydration Rescue in the shade Opal. There are white flakes in the foundation. At first I assumed it was glitter, but upon closer inspection, the flakes are matte. It makes me look like I have dandruff on my face. The ingredients list talc in the foundation, so maybe that's what these are?
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: Not a reccomended purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it claims but not as well as it could. The consistency is very watery compaired to other primers I have used that are more creamy/thicker in consistency. As for the results, it is mattifying when first applied. However by mid day (4-5hrs after applying) the effect has passed. And in my case, after only a few weeks of use, it caused my skin to dryout and become flaky. I was happy to save a few dollars from my previous Neutrogena product, but very disappointed with the results and will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde520

customer_reviews.title: Already Opened and Used Safety Hazard in a Covid world
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived already used. The world is going through a pandemic where it is more important than ever to be able to sanatize the products we buy! There was already foundation on the inside of the cap (which was smudged with someone else's fingerprints by the way) and clearly the pump had been used as there was foundation already in the chamber. Such a safety and health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Anza

customer_reviews.title: Great Drugstore Primer
customer_reviews.text: I like that this primer makes me matte, but doesn’t feel tightening like others. I’d say more of a Demi matte which is what I want in a primer. I’m a very oily person & I find that other matte primers causes my oils to produce quicker because they are so matte on my skin. It’s like my skin is fighting to produce more oils because it’s so dry. This one doesn’t do that for me & I can appreciate that part of it. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Temeika G-A

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Wal-Mart moisturizers. I require sun screen and I can never go back and find the previous product that I just finished. So I decided to try a different way. I am all ready on my second tube of this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this product better than Hourglass Mineral Veil Primer. Unlike the Hourglass that tends to separate in the bottle and "grab" foundation color and look patchy on the skin, the Covergirl primer is smooth and delivers an even finish. It is even good on its own for adding a light finish without foundation.
customer_reviews.author: a.mkua

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, matte, great primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best matte sunscreen primer I've tried. I think I'm done looking! I'm always looking for the best best thing, but if ain't broke..... This is seriously great, I never think that sunscreen can be matte, but this is great primer.
customer_reviews.author: LipglossNinjas

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cover my gray hairs along my hairline or where hair is thinner. I also use it as eyeshadow and for my eyebrows. For this I chose the darkest color.
customer_reviews.author: Swedelady13

customer_reviews.title: Oily girl friendly
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great for people that have oily skin. Love love this product. I work 12 hour shifts so I needed something that was going to work and easy on the pockets. This is definitely that.
customer_reviews.author: MaraJ87

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! My face always looked flawless when using this. I also have very oily skin and the matte really helped
customer_reviews.author: Karen Leveille

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup foundation. The price was also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Wickaz

customer_reviews.title: Love the way this looks and feels in my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this looks and feels on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Beck Shops

customer_reviews.title: My best makeup yet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup. It makes my skin look and feel good. Will purchase again as I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great new product with great color matching and blends well.
customer_reviews.author: cswanhouse

customer_reviews.title: NOT  GOOD
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT GOOD ON YOUR SKIN MAKES YOUR SKIN FEEL VERY DRY.
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Price! Equivalent to some $36 Foundation by well known company
customer_reviews.text: I use a more expensive Foundation for different events. Cover Girl is just about equal to the more expensive makeup for a 3rd of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: earlene cooke

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth dark color & NO ORANGE TONES
customer_reviews.text: This product IS NOT for african american women. ALL of the colors show a bright orange tone. I am of medium to dark in color and I have tried cool#2,3,and 4. NOT FOR WOMEN OF COLOR try BLACK OPAL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Curious

product_meta.title: Covergirl Matte Ambition, Skin Primer Spf 20, 1.01 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Primer| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Put your best face forward with Matte Ambition Matte Skin Primer with SPF 30 from COVERGIRL. Matte primer helps you build a smooth base for all your looks.
feature_bullets: Prep skin with an invisible skim primer layer of SPF and oil control for a shine free finish
This metrifying skin primer extends makeup wear all day

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
